name: Doinky Joe 2: 10 Golden Coins
description:
Doinky Joe is back and as greedy as ever! Collect all the coins as quickly as you can and climb to the top of Piggybank Temple to deposit your money! 

Watch out for those pesky legged fish, they seems to be guarding the coins! Blasted gilled creature with sexy legs!

Share your fastest time on our Discord!

Controls:

WASD/L-Stick - Move the glorious Doinkster

Mouse/R-Stick - Move Camera

Space/A Button - Jump (Double tap for EPIC FART JUMP)

R/Select - Restart Game

Some things I wanted to credit but forgot to in the game:

Music - Indigo - Electronic Senses

Temple Model Pack - https://fertile-soil-productions.itch.io/temple-modular-collection
